## Properties

| Property   | Attribute  | Description                                     | Type      | Default |
| ---------- | ---------- | ----------------------------------------------- | --------- | ------- |
| `disabled` | `disabled` | Disables this option                            | `boolean` | `false` |
| `selected` | `selected` | Marks this option as selected within the select | `boolean` | `false` |
